name: TypedArray.slice
description: The slice() method returns a new typed array (with a new underlying buffer), that contains a copy of a portion of the original typed array. This method has the same algorithm as Array.prototype.slice(). TypedArray is one of the typed array types here.

refs.name: ECMAScript (ECMA-262)
refs.description: The definition of '%TypedArray%.prototype.slice' in the 'ECMAScript (ECMA-262)' specification.
